exceptions.exn: In environment T : cpo s : Pred T Hchain_closed : chain_closed s Unable to unify "let (sort, _, _) := ?M1468 in sort" with "let (sort, _, _) := T in sort".
In environment T : cpo s : Pred T Hchain_closed : chain_closed s Unable to unify "chain_closed s" with "chain_closure s =p s".

In environment T : cpo s : Pred T Hchain_closed : chain_closed s Unable to unify "let 'SimplFun lam := chain_closed in lam (chain_closure ?M1468)" with "forall x : T, x \\In chain_closure s <-> x \\In s".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: cpo
s: Pred T

Goal:
chain_closed s -> chain_closure s =p s

Premises:
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
Notation cpo := CPO.type
chain_closure = fun s : Pred T => [Pred p | forall t : Pred T, s <=p t -> chain_closed t -> p \In t] : Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T
chain_closed = [Pred s | bot \In s /\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \In s)] : Simpl_Pred (Pred T)
chain_clos_min : forall (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> chain_closed t -> chain_closure s <=p t
chain_clos_sub : forall s : Pred T, s <=p chain_closure s
chain_closP : forall s : Pred T, chain_closed (chain_closure s)
sup_clos_idemp : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> sup_closure s =p s
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [T : cpo s : Pred T |- Type] ?T' : [T : cpo s : Pred T |- Type] ?f : [T : cpo s : Pred T |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [T : cpo s : Pred T |- ?T'] ?s : [T : cpo s : Pred T |- seq ?T]
sub_sup : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> Pred (subPoset s) -> subPoset s
prop_supP : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : Prop), p \In s -> p <== prop_sup s
sup_clos_min : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> sup_closed t -> sup_closure s <=p t
prop_sup = fun s : Pred Prop => exists p : Prop, p \In s /\ p : Pred Prop -> Prop
fun_supP : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), p \In s -> p <== fun_sup s
sub_supX : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> forall u : Pred (subPoset s), sub_sup' u \In s
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
prop_supM : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : propPoset), (forall q : Prop, q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_sup s <== p
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
pairCPO = fun A B : cpo => CPO.Pack {| CPO.base := {| Poset.mixin := pairPosetMixin A B |}; CPO.mixin := pairCPOMixin A B |} (A * B) : cpo -> cpo -> cpo
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
fun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), (forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p
Image_inj_eqmem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (X1 X2 : Pred A), injective f -> [Image f i | i <- X1] =p [Image f i | i <- X2] -> X1 =p X2
subLattice : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> lattice
pair_supP : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), p \In s -> p <== pair_sup s
ideal_supP : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : ideal P), p \In s -> p <== ideal_sup s
fun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s
sup_clos_sub : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), s <=p sup_closure s
dfunCPO : forall A : Type, (A -> cpo) -> cpo
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
subp_asym : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p1 -> p1 =p p2
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
CPO.poset = fun cT : cpo => Poset.Pack (CPO.class cT) cT : cpo -> poset CPO.poset is a coercion
CPO.Pack : forall sort : Type, CPO.class_of sort -> Type -> cpo
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
ideal_supM : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : idealPoset P), (forall q : ideal P, q \In s -> q <== p) -> ideal_sup s <== p
subLatticeMixin : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> Lattice.mixin_of (subPoset s)
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
prop_lim = fun s : chain [posetofProp] => exists p : [posetofProp], p \In s /\ p : chain [posetofProp] -> [posetofProp]
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
lat_limM : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), (forall y : A, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lat_lim s <== x
supE : forall (T : lattice) (s1 s2 : Pred T), s1 =p s2 -> sup s1 = sup s2

``` 
intros T s Hchain_closed.
apply sup_clos_idemp.
apply Hchain_closed.
apply chain_closP.
```

original: intros T s Hchain_closed. apply sup_clos_idemp. apply Hchain_closed. apply chain_closP.
